Plot: A newspaper photographer, Jean, researches the lurid and sensational axe murder of two women in 1873 as an editorial tie-in with a brutal modern double murder. She discovers a cache of ...
Title: The Weight of Water
Writer: Anita Shreve (novel), Alice Arlen (screenplay), Christopher Kyle (screenplay)
Actors: Ciarán Hinds, Richard Donat, Sarah Polley, Ulrich Thomsen
tomatoConsensus: The story is too muddled to build any interest.
